segments.text: Oh my goodness, look at that little boy, he's so determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on that stool, reaching up, it's so cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see his little sister, waiting for him to share, it's so sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so sneaky, but I can't help but smile at their teamwork.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the stool is a bit wobbly, but he's so focused on the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it's so lovely to see them working together like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is busy at the sink, but she's missing this precious moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel so happy seeing the kids like this, it's a beautiful sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it, just this once.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stop smiling, it's just so adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR
